citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm to
1:45 pm on 06-Oct-16.
During that time the inspector waited at the facility and no one was present to permit an inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Nanney Rebecca, Veterinary Medical Officer
